<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shared Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4703) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Mortal Herald](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=305) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Premonition of Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4691)

</column>

---

You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies. When you use Premonition of Clarity, allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.
name: Shared Clarity
